ygData.subject: Re: Bull Smasher
ygData.msgSnippet: you talking about the midnight mallet?- I kind of know where to find it - never actually tried it but I was told where & how.   If  you want to know - I ll
ygData.messageBody:
you talking about the midnight mallet?- I kind of know where to find it -
never actually tried it but I was told where & how. If you want to know -
I'll give a spoiler later
-----Original Message-----
From: Marc Stone <mes5415@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 24, 1999 12:32 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Bull Smasher


>From: "Marc Stone" <mes5415@...>
>
>There are a few other good 1h blunt items to replace that screaming mace.
>
>You can get the cold iron morning star from permafrost. dropped by the
>preacher, a rare spawn in the stage room. 9 dmg 35 delay.
>
>or you can get the black enameled mace, dropped off ghoulish savant in
lower
>guk, tougher to get but its 8 dmg, 28 delay, and actually hits a lot harder
>than the cold iron. friend does 30+ pts dmg with it.
>
>or you can get the staff of writhing. 9 dmg 33 delay, plus chaotic
feedback.
>dropped by the noble in solusek a.
>
>as for that mallet, i too am looking for it.
>----- Original Message -----
>From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Sent: Saturday, January 23, 1999 1:59 AM
>Subject: [EQCheats] Bull Smasher
>
>
>>From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>>
>>I was wondering if anyone had any info on where this weapon can be
>>obtained. Please.. My screaming mace just isn't good enough. Thx
